description:
Ayanami appears in front of Teito and Teito wonders if Ayanami is just an illusion like before.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai Naki Mono no Seigi wa Izuko ni... . Yami ni Ubawareshi Kokoro yo, Eien ni...
The Justice of Those Who Lack Love is... . Oh Heart That is Stolen by Darkness, Forever...
愛無き者の正義はいずこに... . 闇に奪われし心よ, 永遠に...
